revised_title: An Account of a New Amphibious Bipes: The Mudskipper
tldr: The author describes a newly discovered amphibious animal, the Mudskipper, found in swampy areas of South Carolina. This unique creature has characteristics of both fish and reptiles, with fins and gills, but also limbs with fingers and claws. The author discusses its appearance, habitat, and behavior, as well as its classification and relation to other known animals.
